items.title: Donald Trump’s 29-year-old crypto guru lays out the president’s plans for regulating crypto and rolling back a Biden-era crackdown
items.description: Since his appointment, Bo Hines has become a mini-celebrity in the crypto world—with CEOs, billionaire investors, and lobbyists vying for face time.

items.title: Trump’s senior crypto advisor donated $1M in campaign advertisements to top Trump Super PAC one week before election
items.description: Bo Hines also served as the CEO of an “anti-woke,” Gen Z-focused digital news platform that partnered with a Trump-affiliated memecoin.

items.title: Chinese President Xi Jinping kickstarts his 3-nation Southeast Asia tour as Trump flip-flops on tariffs
items.description: Xi arrived in Vietnam on Monday, and will visit Malaysia and Cambodia later this week. His visit comes just days after Trump put a 90-day pause on rec...

items.title: Inside the crypto industry’s Faustian bargain with President Trump
items.description: 29-year-old Bo Hines is leading crypto policy at the White House. But will economic volatility upend the sector’s progress?

items.title: Cutting complexity might be the new leadership superpower
items.description: CEOs are confronting complexity and organizational bloat. Here's how.
